page.title: 14Clothing:Casual/Sports
page.content: {Casual clothes} are worn when we want to feel comfortable and relax. They are easy to wear and easy to take care of. We like to feel they make us more attractive. The most popular colours at the moment are pale pastel, and different items are chosen to match each other. {Sports clothes} are designed to be hard wearing, light and easy to move in. Some specialised sports clothing is tough and gives added protection. Shorts and shirt are common for outdoor sports, a leotard may be worn indoors by girls. Cricketers wear special pads to protect their legs, and hats to protect their heads. Shoes are very important too. Footballers have strong light shoes with studs in the soles, runners have spiked shoes to give added grip, netballers wear strong, light flat soled shoes.
